bug.author: zhoonit
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Issue Description</denchmark-h>
It somehow passed all TC after several attempts, just reporting this for the records for the time being. Needs more investigation before discussion. <denchmark-h:h1>Test ouput</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>08:40:54 /nnstreamer/build/tests/nnstreamer_filter_extensions_common/unittest_tizen_tensorflow --gst-plugin-path=../.. --- stdout --- [==========] Running 13 tests from 1 test case. [----------] Global test environment set-up. [----------] 13 tests from nnstreamer_tf_basic_functions [ RUN ] nnstreamer_tf_basic_functions.check_existence tests/nnstreamer_filter_extensions_common/unittest_tizen_tensorflow.cc:23: Failure Expected: (sp) != ((void *) __null), actual: NULL vs NULL [ FAILED ] nnstreamer_tf_basic_functions.check_existence (1 ms) [ RUN ] nnstreamer_tf_basic_functions.open_close_00_n tests/nnstreamer_filter_extensions_common/unittest_tizen_tensorflow.cc:44: Failure Expected: (sp) != ((void *) __null), actual: NULL vs NULL --- stderr --- </denchmark-code>
** (process:1926): WARNING **: Failed to load the configuration, no config file found. <denchmark-h:h1>How to Reproduce</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>$ rm -rf build $ meson --prefix=${NNST_ROOT} --sysconfdir=${NNST_ROOT} --libdir=lib --bindir=bin -- includedir=include build $ ninja -C build test </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h1>Further Information</denchmark-h>
Tested on Ubuntu 18.04

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/2292>#2292</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.

This is due to past installed nnstreamer with different feature affects later test cases. <denchmark-code>$ rm -rf $NNST_ROOT/lib/* $ rm -rf $NNST_ROOT/bin/* $ rm -rf $NNST_ROOT/include/* </denchmark-code>
resolves the issue.
